-- | The OptDir type for representing optimization directions.
module Data.OptDir

-- | The <a>OptDir</a> type represents optimization directions.
data OptDir

-- | minimization
OptMin :: OptDir

-- | maximization
OptMax :: OptDir
instance Typeable OptDir
instance Bounded OptDir
instance Enum OptDir

instance Data OptDir
instance Ord OptDir
instance Read OptDir
